title: Transformers Comics Part 2 (IDW, Funpub, and Other)
description:
Transformers Comics Part 2 (IDW, Funpub, and Other)


Collected here are all of the Transformers comics from IDW (2005-ongoing) and Funpub (2005-ongoig), as well as miscellaneous other comics & reference works.

I have another torrent which collects the comics from Marvel (1984-1995), Dreamwave (2002-2004), Devil's Due (2003-2007), and 3H (1997-2004), as well as the IDW Marvel reprints.

The issues are sorted into folders based on which continuity-family they belong to and then numbered into a reading order based mostly on publication date.

Some folders have subfolders named "(Alternatives)" or "(Trades)" that contain alternative scans or digital trade paperback collections of some of the issues in the parent folder. If this duplication bothers you, don't download the files in the various "(Alternatives)" and "(Trades)" folders unless you are dissatisfied with the content or quality of the primary copies.

Thanks to all of the writers, artists, editors and support staff at IDW and Funpub (and any other shop I missed) who worked on these comics.

Thanks to all the other uploaders I got these files from, in particular: thesergesasasa, ZINC, nemesis43, Hagetaka, soundx, and ThatTFAnon.

I'm on a relatively slow connection, so it will take at least a couple days for me to upload the entire thing. Please be patient and stick around to seed.
